mapper.select: SELECT r.r_code, r.user_no, r.p_code, r.status, r.amount, r.t_price, p.title, p.start_day, p.end_day FROM tbl_reservation r JOIN tbl_product p ON r.p_code = p.p_code WHERE r.user_no = #{userNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_reservation (user_no, p_code, amount, t_price, status, created_at) VALUES (#{userNo}, #{pCode}, #{amount}, #{totalPrice}, 1, SYSDATE)
